text: @realDonaldTrump Everyone take a great look at Cuomo on PrimeTime who had Covid19!  1. He never stopped working. 2. Went outside to enjoy fresh air with son while having COVID19. 3.  Recovered without Vaccine. #FireFaucci/Brix.
